title: Impulse - ball collides with wall F-t equation

content.description: The force <math alttext="F" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi></math> exerted on a ball during a collision with a wall is given by the equation <math alttext="F equals, alpha t, minus beta times t squared" overflow="scroll"> <mi>F</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mi>α</mi> <mi>t</mi> <mo>-</mo> <mi>β</mi> <msup> <mi>t</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </math>, where <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> is time, <math alttext="alpha equals 300 newtons per second" overflow="scroll"><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>300</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N/s</mtext></math>, and <math alttext="beta equals 3000 newtons per second squared" overflow="scroll"><mi>β</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3000</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><msup><mtext>N/s</mtext><mn>2</mn></msup></math>. The ball initially contacts the wall at <math alttext="t equals 0 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>, and the collision has a duration of <math alttext="0.10 second" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math>.
content.question: What is the magnitude of the change of momentum of the ball?

choices.label: <math alttext="0.50 kilogram meter per second" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.50</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>kg</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">·</mo><mtext>m/s</mtext></math>
<math alttext="7.5 kilogram meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mn>7.5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>kg</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">·</mo><mtext>m/s</mtext></math>
<math alttext="30 kilogram meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mn>30</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>kg</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">·</mo><mtext>m/s</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="0.50 kilogram meter per second" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.50</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>kg</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">·</mo><mtext>m/s</mtext></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
